evidence.source_document: Order Granting Plaintiffs’ Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order
Order Granting Plaintiffs’ Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order
evidence.text: On August 11, 2023, Camp Integrity and ten individual plaintiffs filed their complaint and moved for a temporary restraining order and preliminary injunction.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a complaint and a motion for a temporary restraining order and preliminary injunction on August 16, 2023, requesting the court to halt enforcement of the ordinance.

evidence.source_document: Order Granting in Part and Denying in Part Plaintiffs’ Motion for Preliminary Injunction
Order Granting in Part and Denying in Part Plaintiffs’ Motion for Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs filed a motion for a preliminary injunction.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a motion for a preliminary injunction on October 19, 2023, seeking a preliminary injunction limiting enforcement of the ordinance.

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Defendant's Motion to Dismiss
evidence.text: On May 10, 2024, Defendant filed a notice for a motion to dismiss or in the alternative to dissolve the preliminary injunction.

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Defendant's Motion to Dismiss
evidence.text: Defendant now moves to dismiss Plaintiffs’ complaint on grounds of mootness and alternatively moves to dissolve the preliminary injunction.

extracted.value: Defendant filed a notice for a motion to dismiss or to dissolve the preliminary injunction on May 10, 2024, asking the court to dismiss the complaint and dissolve the injunction.

evidence.source_document: Order Granting Defendant's Motion to Dismiss
Order Granting Defendant's Motion to Dismiss
evidence.text: Defendant now moves to dismiss Plaintiffs’ complaint on grounds of mootness and alternatively moves to dissolve the preliminary injunction.

extracted.value: Defendant filed a motion to dismiss the complaint on August 7, 2024, seeking dismissal for lack of subject matter jurisdiction and to dissolve the preliminary injunction.

evidence.source_document: Order Conditionally Granting Defendant's Emergency Motion for Limited Relief From Injunction
evidence.text: The Court held a hearing on the City’s emergency motion for relief on June 13 and 14, 2024.

evidence.source_document: Order Conditionally Granting Defendant's Emergency Motion for Limited Relief From Injunction
evidence.text: ORDER CONDITIONALLY GRANTING DEFENDANT’S EMERGENCY MOTION FOR LIMITED RELIEF FROM INJUNCTION

extracted.value: Defendant filed an emergency motion for limited relief from the injunction on June 13-14, 2024, asking the court to grant limited relief.
